oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stamps Quartet - American Beauty Flour #1 and #2 - 1947-07-07
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Stamp Quartet (musical group) performing a variety of gospel tunes. The broadcast is sponsored by the American Beauty Flour. The show is hosted by Roy George (entertainer). The broadcast is recorded at the KWHI radio station in Brenham, Texas. The recording is listed as show number one and two. The recording is from July 07, 1947.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Stamps Quartet; Roy George
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Roy George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (00:10) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (00:25) George introduces Frank Stamps -- (00:39) Stamps greets the audience -- (00:58) A Home Up in Heaven (Stamps Quartet) -- (03:38) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (04:42) The Song in My Soul (Stamps Quartet) -- (06:35) Stamps introduces "He Whispers Sweet Peace to Me" -- (06:50) He Whispers Sweet Peace to Me (Stamps Quartet) -- (09:33) Stamp performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (09:51) I'll Fly Away (Stamps Quartet) -- (12:22) George and Stamp perform an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (12:45) [Tape repeats] -- (13:14) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (13:21) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (13:37) George greets the audience and introduces Stamp -- (13:51) Stamp greets the audience -- (14:11) Only One Savior (Stamps Quartet) -- (17:57) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (18:52) Old Gospel Ship (Stamps Quartet) -- (20:17) Stamp introduces "Hide Me Rock of Ages" -- (20:36) Hide Me Rock of Ages (Stamp Quartet) -- (24:04) The Glory Land Way (Stamps Quartet) -- (25:30) George and Stamp perform an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (25:58) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Stamps Quartet; George, Roy;
